ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: HAHA!   I tried to convince a GM to let me in or at least get me some screenshots but he wouldnt  :-P I think i could get in by hacking but i would be afraid
ygData.messageBody:
HAHA! I tried to convince a GM to let me in or at least get me some
screenshots but he wouldnt :-P

I think i could get in by hacking but i would be afraid that i might loose
my character That would suck!

Trevalien
